description: Embrace limitless possibilities with Safe{Core}'s modular Smart Account infrastructure, tailored for all account abstraction use cases, including ERC-4337.

title: Build the Most Secure Onchain Apps
text: Leverage the most battle-tested smart account stack, securing over $100 billion in assets.

items.title: Protocol Kit
items.text:
• Modular and customizable smart contract accounts
  • Battle-tested security
  • Transaction Batching

items.title: Auth Kit
items.text:
• Easy on-boarding using Web3Auth
  • Social and wallet logins
  • Get users started without a wallet

items.title: Relay Kit
items.text:
• Gas-less experiences using Gelato
  • Sponsored transaction
  • Pay fees in ERC-20 tokens

items.title: Onramp Kit
items.text:
• Seamless Fiat on-ramping using Stripe
  • Pay using a credit card
